channel.title: 2 Zillion-Year-Old Hippie
channel.description: The 2 Zillion-Year-Old-Hippie answers the magnificent questions submitted by listeners. Join the hippie and his robot-toaster-neighbor Synthia from high atop the Big Rock Candy Mountain. The hippie is a "stoner" and this is comedy but this isn't your typical "stoner comedy."
channel.itunes:subtitle: Good music, comedy and vibes.
channel.itunes:author: 2 Zillion Year Old Hippie
channel.itunes:summary: The 2 Zillion-Year-Old-Hippie answers the magnificent questions submitted by listeners. Join the hippie and his robot-toaster-neighbor Synthia from high atop the Big Rock Candy Mountain. The hippie is a "stoner" and this is comedy but this isn't your typical "stoner comedy."

item.title: A+5
item.description: The Magnetic Fields "Smoke and Mirrors" Morphine "Yes" Love And Rockets "Mirror People (Slow Version)" The Dukes Of Stratosphear "What In The World??…" The Kinks "Big Sky" The Chemical Brothers "Let Forever Be" Air "Kelly Watch The Stars" The Byrds "Eight Miles High" The Youngbloods "Darkness, Darkness" Queen "Bohemian Rhapsody" Todd Rundgren "International Feel" Os Mutantes  "Panis Et Circenses" The Beatles "Tomorrow Never Knows -> Within You Without You" (mashed by Pete21p) Dog In The Piano "Indian Ropeman" Was (Not Was) "The Party Broke Up"
item.dc:creator: 2 Zillion Year Old Hippie

item.title: Hi-Fi Hippie Show 48
item.description: Music and comedy with the 2-Zillion-Year-Old Hippie. Yellowman "Mi Believe (Summer Holiday)" The Yardbirds "White Summer" Flogging Molly "Devil's Dance Floor" Samuel Jackson "Hulk" http://gizmodo.com/5905604/tonights-stoner-channel-samuel-l-jackson-on-hulk-weed/gallery/1 Sugarloaf "Green-Eyed Lady" Dispatch "The General" Richard & Linda Thompson "Wall Of Death" Elvis Costello & The Attractions "Shabby Doll" Every news report http://www.vidaddict.com/charlie-brooker-accurately-describes-every-news-report/ Ray Charles "I've Got News For You" Alabama Shakes "You Ain't Alone" http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=0HxNtWEIKhQ Django Django "Default" Jimmy Kimmell http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2012/04/28/jimmy-kimmel-whcd-pot_n_1462140.html?1335670575 Squeeze Play "The Truth" The Police "On Any Other Day" Talking Heads "Born Under Punches (The Heat Goes On)" ‪Joe Rogan‬ "‪Rethink ‬Y‪our ‬L‪ife‬" http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YaxrQAv1S38 Badfinger "Andy Norris" Wilco "I Might" Otis Redding "Satisfaction" http://www.watchcartoononline.com/futurama-episode-320-godfellas Jack White "Love Interruption" Ian McCulloch "In My Head" Van Morrison "Stormy Monday/Have You Ever Loved A Woman?/No Rollin' Blues" http://2zillionhippie.podomatic.com/ http://blacklightintheattic.net/episodes/2-zillion-year-old-hippie http://www.spiritplantsradio.com/

item.title: Hi-Fi Hippie Show 420 Spectacular!
item.description: Celebrate the holiday with the 2 Zillion-Year-Olf Hippie and Synthia. Joe Walsh "Life's Been Good" Afroman "Smoke Two Blunts" FLuffeeTalks "Make 420 an Official Holiday" http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YJURLYER6vM World Party "#9 Dream" Eek A Mouse "Weed Weed" ‪Dave Chappelle- Sesame Street‬ http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i73dWYJqVHk Janelle Monáe "Neon Valley Street" George Harrison "Ballad Of Sir Frankie Crisp (Let It Roll)" Katt Williams - White Friends & Weed http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E-P9DBAtl74 Bob Marley & The Wailers "Jamming [Live]" Hippie & Synthia "Stoner Jokes" B/W Pete Fountain "Muskrat Ramble" DJ Slim "Utilize Your High" David Bowie "Jump They Say" Muddy Waters "Champagne & Reefer" Chris Rock "Legalizing Drugs" http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWERzwbobOk MiniBoone "Funny Money" I Roy "Space Flight" Eddie Izzard "Death Star Canteen" http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hp69rg6Hdlo Bauhaus "Ziggy Stardust" Better Than Ezra "Extra Ordinary" Tony Rock - Stoner Philosophy http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fYWRkTbduSo&feature=relmfu Los Lobos "Don't Worry Baby" Sly & The Family Stone "I Want To Take You Higher" Dave Chappelle - Weed Conversations http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c-3BMONj7WM The Magnetic Fields "Smoke and Mirrors" Bone Thugs N' Harmony "Weed Song" Rufus "Sideways" Cream "I Feel Free" [BBC] Little Junior's Blue Flames "Feelin' Good" The Manhattan Transfer "Coo Coo U" http://2zillionhippie.podomatic.com http://blacklightintheattic.net/episodes/2-zillion-year-old-hippie http://www.spiritplantsradio.com
